DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator Week Clinical Study Allocation Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no question related to amount of time during the week that a researcher can devote to a clinical trial or clinical study for the PEARL network, an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator Week Clinical Study Allocation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to amount of time during the week that a researcher can devote to a clinical trial or clinical study for the PEARL network, an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:a researcher in a clinical trial or clinical study.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any period of seven consecutive days.:A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.:Distribution of resources over various time periods, products, operations, or investments.

Concepts.definition: Any period of seven consecutive days.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The distribution of resources over various time periods, products, operations, or investments.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: As an investigator in the PEA
ReferenceDocuments.description: As an investigator in the PEARL Network, depending upon the complexity of the trial, do you feel your site could devote 2 to 4 hours per week to clinical research activity (i.e., data entry, etc.)

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/6/2014 CDE versioned to use Standard Indicator VD.  jc  8/19/14 Released CDE with retired VD for review. jc
